content: Wandering Wight has a series of extremely hard-hitting attacks, and he's not afraid to use them. Some of these attacks can potentially one-shot you, so learning how to recognize and dodge them will make the fight much easier. Here are the attacks you can expect to see from Wandering Wight:

Wandering Wight has a series of extremely hard-hitting attacks, and he's not afraid to use them. Some of these attacks can potentially one-shot you, so learning how to recognize and dodge them will make the fight much easier. Here are the attacks you can expect to see from Wandering Wight:
